title: 美国前驻联合国大使Stop Communist请愿签名超过10万，能变成最终法案吗？
contents:
It’s time for Congress to take action on China. SIGN Nikki Haley’s petition to bring manufacturing of critical medicine and supplies back to the USA and to stop the spread of Communist China’s influence.

https://stopcommunistchina.com

美前驻联合国大使Haley发起请愿:

1.调查中国在新冠病毒爆发中作用;
2.结束中国在美国关键进口物质上卡脖子,将医疗设备和医药制造迁回;
3.中国需在联合国和其他国际组织支付与其第二大经济体相符的经费，而不应受到"发展中国家"待遇;
4.反对霸凌台湾，支持台湾加入世卫;
5.美国大学需关闭来华资金.

Thank you to the 100,000+ who signed our petition urging Congress to hold China accountable. If you haven’t signed  up to have your voice heard, go to http://stopcommunistchina.com  The time for action is now

https://twitter.com/NikkiHaley
